Method Detail

findView

<V extends android.view.View> V findView(int id)
Finds a view that was identified by the id attribute from the XML that was processed in Activity.onCreate(android.os.Bundle)

Type Parameters:
V - The View class
Parameters:
id - The id to search for.
Returns:
The view if found or null otherwise.

inflate

android.view.View inflate(int resource)
Inflate a new view hierarchy from the specified xml resource.

Parameters:
resource - ID for an XML layout resource to load
Returns:
The root View of the inflated XML file.

executeOnUIThread

void executeOnUIThread(Runnable runnable)
Runs the specified action on the UI thread. If the current thread is the UI thread, then the action is executed immediately. If the current thread is not the UI thread, the action is posted to the event queue of the UI thread. If the current Activity is not equals to this, then no action is executed

Parameters:
runnable - the action to run on the UI thread
